content: I'm wondering if anyone knows of a publicly available FHIR server that supports SDC population? I went through a good portion of the servers on https://wiki.hl7.org/Publicly_Available_FHIR_Servers_for_testing but didn't see any that were supporting this operation (or their capability statement doesn't say they do).
There is one in that list that extends Aidbox with SDC support. I was hoping for support natively on a public FHIR server. This may work though for my use-case.
I can set up a public aidbox instance with SDC support. Will it work for you @Ralph ?
@Ilya Beda Yea that would be great, much appreciated :+1:
